original_title: Every Time We Meet for Ice Cream Your Whole F*cking Face Explodes
overview: Ethan is in love with the weird girl in school. The one with the twitchy eyes and spiders in her hair. The one who can't sit still for even a minute and speaks in an odd squeaky voice. The one they call Spiderweb.
title: Every Time We Meet for Ice Cream Your Whole F*cking Face Explodes
